text: kya tumanen dekha nahin ki allaah hee ko sajada karate hai ve sab jo aakaashon mein hai aur jo dharatee mein hai, aur soory, chandrama, taare pahaad, vrksh, jaanavar aur bahut-se manushy? aur bahut-se aise hai jinapar yaatana ka auchity siddh ho chuka hai, aur jise allaah apamaanit kare us sammaanit karanevaala koee nahin. nissandeh allaah jo chaahe karata hai
